price: Y Mi orden es dada solo una vez, y ejecutada en un abrir y cerrar de ojos.
arabic: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥin bil-baṣari
